pullRequest.title: Fix receive link processor request upstream logic
pullRequest.bodyText: When a receive link closes, requestUpstream call in AmqpReceiveLinkProcessor triggers onNext() with already closed link due to how repeat() works and then when another requestUpstream is triggered, the request is not propagated to the upstream. This change is to propagate that request upstream to actually get the new receive link that is not closed.

commit.message: Fix receive link processor request upstream logic

nodes.bodyText: Out of curiousity, why the switch to an explicit ScheduledExecutorService over Schedulers.single() and Scheduler.schedulePeriodically?
